item.title: AWS DC Summit - Recap
item.description: What fits somewhere in between re:Invent and Community Day events? That would be the AWS Summits! This year, I got to experience a double dose of fun by representing Alkira at our booth and presenting at the AWS Community Developer Lounge. I may be biased, but I believe the Alkira team is the best in the world. It was a blast getting to talk about cloud networking with event attendees while getting a glimpse of how the public sector is adapting to change.
